modName: ZMX UI MeanCloud CP for A18
modShortDescription: The purpose of this 7 Days to Die mod is to enable compatibility between SMX UI and MeanCloud's Mining Mod. Dependencies: SMX UI, MeanCloud's Mining Mod.
modDescription:
The purpose of this 7 Days to Die mod is to enable compatibility between SMX UI and MeanCloud’s Mining Mod.

* **Dependencies:** [SMX UI](https://7daystodiemods.com/smxui/), [MeanCloud’s Mining Mod](https://7daystodiemods.com/mining-mod-with-copper-zinc-and-excavators/).
* **Compatibility:** Sirillion expect issues with other mods that modify the forge, forge slots or input materials.

**[Download](https://github.com/Sirillion/ZMXuiMeanCloudCP/archive/master.zip)**

If you feel like making a donation to support the development of the SMX mods, use [this link](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_donations&business=5VLRBAFXDCXBC&item_name=SMX+Development&currency_code=NOK&source=url).

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/15206-smxui-a18/).

**Credits:** [Sirillion](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/sirillion/)
